Sersine sets many tasks for her subordinates. Were she not so distinguished a combatant, one might be disinclined to perform them. It is easy to forget her Mysterium ties when she is surrounded by the burning demon corpses.

Sersine has asked that all {@LinkCreature:13#7#disc reapers} become extinct. While not entirely possible, she accepts wholesale killing as a substitute.

It would appear that a mere handful suffices to meet her demands. Was this not mentioned?
